entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then light after midnight. Low 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
